timeline.body:
@peter-hofer We need to support this method, since it is reachable from `ByteBuffer.allocateDirect` and invoked before running out of native memory.

If you see an easy way to implement the "real" JDK 8 semantics of helping with reference processing, please do it. Otherwise I think this substitution should be good enough.
